articles.title: Netflix Launches First-Ever ‘Stranger Things’ Pop-Up Stores (TV News Roundup) - Variety
articles.description: Netflix is launching its first-ever “Stranger Things” pop-up stores on Nov. 6. The pop-up shops, located in New York City’s Times Square and The Americana at Brand in L.A., will immerse fans in the “Stranger Things” universe, offering exclusive merchandise fo…
articles.content:

articles.title: Anglo American appoints South African Duncan Wanblad as CEO to replace Mark Cutifani - Moneyweb
articles.description: Wanblad is the first local to be appointed to the position in more than a decade.
articles.content:
Anglo American has chosen a 54-year old South African, Duncan Wanblad, as the successor to outgoing CEO Mark Cutifani, who steps down in April next year after nine years at the helm.
Tony Trahar was… [+4357 chars]
